words.source: H3513 Qal jussive 3fs of כָּבַד 'to be heavy, burdensome'; KJV 'let there more work be laid', ESV 'let heavier work be laid', NASB 'let the labor be heavier'
H5656 def. art. + n.fs עֲבוֹדָה 'work, labor, service'; KJV 'work', ESV 'work', NASB 'labor'
H5921 prep. 'upon, on'; all trans. agree
H376 def. art. + n.mp אִישׁ 'man'; KJV 'the men', ESV 'the men', NASB 'the men'
H6213 conj. + Qal jussive 3mp of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'let them labour therein', ESV 'let them labor at it', NASB 'let them work at it'
prep. b- + 3fs suff.; KJV 'therein', ESV 'at it', NASB 'at it'
H408 conj. + neg. particle אַל 'not' (jussive negator); all trans. agree
H8159 Qal jussive 3mp of שָׁעָה 'to gaze, regard, pay attention'; KJV 'let them not regard', ESV 'let them not pay regard', NASB 'let them not pay attention'
H1697 prep. b- + n.mp construct דָּבָר 'word, matter'; KJV 'vain words', ESV 'lying words', NASB 'false words'
H8267 n.ms שֶׁקֶר 'lie, falsehood'; KJV 'vain words', ESV 'lying words', NASB 'false words'
